keyDecisions.decision: Project scope: Web browser game, target age 8-12, being built BY a 9-year-old developer
Game concept: Move character around, animal theme, goal is to free animals from a zoo
Gameplay: Play as a monkey, puzzle-based cage unlocking, avoid zookeepers
Controls: Arrow keys. Puzzles: Mix including math. Caught mechanic: Solve escape puzzle to continue
Phase 1 Complete: Game design finalized for Escape the Zoo
Implementation complete: Level 1 & 2 of Escape the Zoo game built
